problem_text: Use the figure to find the indicated variable. If m \angle 4 = 2 x - 17 and m \angle 1 = 85, find x.
compact_text: Use the figure to find the indicated variable. If m \angle 4 = 2x-17 and m \angle 1 = 85, find x.
annotat_text: Use the figure to find the indicated variable. If $m \angle 4 = 2x - 17$ and $m \angle 1 = 85$, find $x$.
